scripts.install:cli: cd apps/cli && npm run build && npm link
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm run build -w @semiont/api-types && npm run build -w @semiont/config && npm run build -w @semiont/test-utils && npm run build -w @semiont/cloud
scripts.build:apps: npm run build -w semiont-backend && npm run build -w semiont-frontend && npm run build -w semiont-cli
